channel.title: Master
channel.description: ok i want to put a master on devolution v6 to lvl 99 all stats where do i put it can some1 explain?

item.title: Master
item.dc:creator: @durent durent
item.description:
@durent wrote:

Sure dude what this is going to do is Give you 99 in every stat that you have, your gona want to stick this under any one of your command for example it would say something like

if (command.startsWith("aboveground") && playerRights >= 2) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = (absY - 6400); sendMessage("K-ag"); } if (command.startsWith("belowground") && playerRights >= 2) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = (absY + 6400); sendMessage("K-ug"); }

You want to stick it were the “if” starts thats probly the best i can explain it so um heres the command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. your a nerd."); }

so it should look like

if (command.startsWith("aboveground") && playerRights >= 2) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = (absY - 6400); sendMessage("K-ag"); } if (command.startsWith("belowground") && playerRights >= 2) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = (absY + 6400); sendMessage("K-ug"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. your a nerd."); }
